actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to permit honorably discharged veterans of the Armed Forces of the United States to render the military salute when the flag is hoisted, lowered, or is passing in a parade or review; when the national anthem is played, and when the pledge of allegiance to the flag is given; and to clarify the rules governing patriotic conduct at such times.

summary.text: Permits honorably discharged veterans of the Armed Forces of the United States to render the military salute when the flag is hoisted, lowered, or is passing in a parade or review; when the national anthem is played; and when the pledge of allegiance to the flag is given.

titles.title: A bill to permit honorably discharged veterans of the Armed Forces of the United States to render the military salute when the flag is hoisted, lowered, or is passing in a parade or review; when the national anthem is played, and when the pledge of allegiance to the flag is given; and to clarify the rules governing patriotic conduct at such times.
